articles.description: The coronavirus has killed so many people in Iran that the country has resorted to mass burials, but in neighboring Iraq, the body count is fewer than 100.
articles.content:
Iraqi border agents at the Zurbatiya border crossing with Iran. On the other side lies the largest epicenter of the virus in the Middle East. On the Iraqi side, there are relatively few cases.

articles.description: Like now, social distancing played a role in stemming the flu's progress in 1918.
articles.content:
The term social distancing didnt exist in 1918.
But the concept did, although in a more limited form than with todays stay-at-home orders in response to the novel coronavirus.
